question:
Year(s): 1775-1783
Location: Eastern North American
Combatants: US, France vs. Great Britain, Hessians (German mercenaries)
Resolution: Treaty of Paris (1783), British recognition of US independence

Year(s): 1786-1787
Location: Massachusetts
Combatants: US vs. anti-government protestors
Resolution: Articles of Confederation problems prompted Constitutional Convention

Year(s): 1791-1794
Location: Western Pennsylvania
Combatants: US vs. Frontier Tax protestors
Resolution: US was capable of suppressing violent resistance, tax still difficult to collect, political parties formed

Year(s): 1798-1900
Location: Atlantic Ocean, Caribbean
Combatants: US, Great Britain vs. France
Resolution: Convention of 1800 - Franco-American relations restored, facilitated Louisiana Purchase (1803)

Year(s): 1799-1800
Location: Pennsylvania
Combatants: US vs. Frontier Tax Protestors
Resolution: John Adams pardoned those guilty of treason due to be hanged including Fries

Year(s): 1801-1805, 1815
Location: Mediterranean Sea
Combatants: US, Sweden vs. Barbery States (Tunis, Algeries, Tripoli)
Resolution: Ended Muslim piracy in the Mediterranean

Year(s): 1812-1815
Location: Eastern/Central North America
Combatants: US vs. United Kingdom
Resolution: Treaty of Ghent - status quo ante bellum, Washington (White House and Capitol) burned down

Year(s): 1835-1836
Location: Texas
Combatants: Republic of Texas vs. Mexico
Resolution: Texan independence then US annexation (1845)

Year(s): 1846-1848
Location: Texas, Southwestern US
Combatants: US, California Republic vs. Mexico
Resolution: Treaty of Guadalupe Hidalgo, Mexican Cession, Mexican recognition of US sovereignty over Texas/California

Year(s): 1854-1861
Location: Kansas, Missouri
Combatants: Anti-slavery Free-Staters vs. Pro-slavery Border Ruffians
Resolution: Kansas admitted as a free state (1861)

Year(s): 1859
Location: West Virginia
Combatants: US vs. Abolitionist Insurgents
Resolution: Abolitionist/slave revolt suppressed, prelude to Civil War, Brown executed
answer: John Brown's Raid on Harper's Ferry

question:
Year(s): 1861-1865
Location: Southern US
Combatants: US vs. Confederate States
Resolution: Confederacy dissolved, slavery abolished, Reconstruction Era begins, 13/14/15th amendments, US increases control of Indian Territory

Year(s): 1898
Location: Cuba, Puerto Rico, Philippines, Guam
Combatants: US, Cuban/Filipino Revolutionaries vs. Spain
Resolution: Treaty of Paris, Protectorate over Cuba, collapse of Spanish Empire

Year(s): 1899-1902
Location: Philippines
Combatants: US vs. Philippine Republic
Resolution: US occupation of the Philippines

Year(s): 1917-1918
Location: Europe, Africa, Asia
Combatants: US, France, British Empire, Russia (Allied) vs. Germany, Austria-Hungary, Ottoman Empire (Central)
Resolution:End of Central Powers empires and transfer of their colonies, League of Nations established

Year(s): 1939-1945
Location: Europe, oceans
Combatants: US, Soviet Union, United Kingdom, China (Allied) vs. Germany, Japan, Italy (Axis)
Resolution: Collapse of Axis empires (Third Reich falls), United Nations created, Cold War begins

Year(s): 1950-1953
Location: Korea
Combatants: US, South Korea, United Kingdom vs. North Korea, China, Soviet Union
Resolution: Koream Armistice Agreement - DMZ runs along 38th parallel separating the Koreas

Year(s): 1961
Location: Cuba
Combatants: US vs. Cuba
Resolution: Castro solidified, Cuba pushed closer to Soviet Unionz

Year(s): 1947-1991
Location: No physical location
Combatants: US vs. Soviet Union
Resolution: Dissolution of the Soviet Union (1991)

Year(s): 1955-1964, 1965-1973, 1974-1975
Location: Vietnam, Cambodia, Laos
Combatants: US, South Vietnam vs. North Vietnam, Viet Cong
Resolution: US withdraw from Indochina, Republic of Vietnam dissolves, unifies, and communism ensues

Year(s): 1990-1991
Location: Iraq, Kuwait, Saudi Arabia, Israel
Combatants: US, Kuwait, United Kingdom, Saudia Arabia vs. Iraw
Resolution: Iraqi wtihdrawal from Kuwait with sanctions, Emir Jaber III restored

Year(s): 2001-Present
Location: Afghanistan
Combatants: US, Afghanistan, Resolute Support Mission vs. Taliban, al-Qaeda
Resolution: Fall of Taliban government, death of Osama bin Laden, War on Terror continues

Year(s): 2003-2011
Location: Iraq
Combatants: US, Iraq, United Kingdom vs. Ba'ath Loyalists
Resolution: Rise then later fall of al-Qaeda, democratic Shia-led government, US withdrawal, Iraqi Civil War (2014-2017)
